title: Lag spikes
body:
hey , im playing with a steady ping of 70 ! ping never change at all , but i keep getting Lag spike pretty often when i play , 

i dont download anything and my internet is 50 mbp.
i search for a fix in google but all i get is post from 2013 that doesnt work for me !
pls some 1 help with this issue

replies.body: It sounds like you might be having packet loss issues in your connection, which won't always reflect in your ping.  Run a [log reader](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/209765743-Connection-Troubleshooting-Log-Reader) for the impacted games so we can know for sure, and let me know what you find.

ok i have ton of packet loss . dont know why. or what cuz it .

i check logs from last year and 2 years ago , and got not single packet loss
so why is that happening ?
